title: D'Ambrosia Family Endowed Chair in Orthopedics
description: To provide support for a chair in the Department of Orthopedics at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  Support includes research, salaries, supplies and program support for the benefit of the adult (non-pediatric) division.
marketingContent: To provide support for a chair in the Department of Orthopedics at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  Support includes research, salaries, supplies and program support for the benefit of the adult (non-pediatric) division.
